column1: Please rate how much control and flexibility you have over your time (e.g. to leave work to take care of a personal matter)
column2: Please rate how safe and secure you feel in your job
column3: Please rate how you feel about the amount of work you have to do
column4: Please rate how you feel about the nature of your work
column5: Please rate how you feel about learning and growth opportunities at work
column6: Please rate the nature of your social relationships with your work colleagues
column7: Please rate the nature of your relationship with your manager or supervisor
column8: Please rate how informed you feel about what is going on in your team
column9: Please rate how you perceive your work is valued and recognized
column10: How regularly to you engage in physical exercise (30 minutes or more)?
column11: How often do you eat processed, packaged, or fast food that is not made from fresh ingredients?
